name: The Fleas - Aggressors
description:
The Fleas are FREE now and FOREVER.
FREE:
-tesla fingers
-turret
-lightning tower

The Fleas combines the timeless appeal of arcade games with classic movie-stye animations. You'll love exterminating these pests in this unique flea-hunt game. Don't miss it!


AMAZING VISUAL EFFECTS!
- Classic movie-style graphics and animation
- Powerful game engine and realtime visual effects
- Full Retina support


HOURS OF FUN & ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY!
- Unique game-play mechanics
- 12 Achievements and numerous PowerUps
- Game Center support


Compatible with iOS 6.0+
